Description: A python implementation of, the popular card game, blackjack. A user can play blackjack against a dealer and their wins/losses were stored. To win blackjack the playerâ€™s cards must sum closer to 21 than the dealer. And the player may not have a card sum value of over 21.
A python program that solves an 8-puzzle with the following algorithms: DFS, BFS, and Dijkstra.

A C++ implementation of a binary search tree data structure. Data members and methods were created to implement the data structure. Some methods include: adding a node to the tree, removing a node from the tree, and searching for a node in the tree.
